metadata.name: Sona Eyes #1
metadata.description:
In fact,all the characters of my paintings,look like to myown face.
Women with sad and colorful eyes.
Half in the dark,and half in the light.
In my opinion,every human, beying has a shadow that they hides from others.
My self portraites are not free from this principle.
But the eyes are the mirror of the heart.
Even if one lies,the eyes show the most right.
